name: @umbraco/acceptance-test-helpers
description: Test helpers and builders for making Playwright tests for Umbraco solutions

scripts.test: npm run build && npx playwright test DefaultConfig
scripts.ui: npm run build && npx playwright test --ui DefaultConfig
scripts.testSqlite: npm run build && npx playwright test DefaultConfig --grep-invert "Users"
scripts.all: npm run build && npx playwright test
scripts.smokeTest: npm run build && npx playwright test DefaultConfig --grep "@smoke"
scripts.smokeTestSqlite: npm run build && npx playwright test DefaultConfig --grep "@smoke" --grep-invert "Users"
scripts.releaseTest: npm run build && npx playwright test DefaultConfig --grep "@release"
scripts.testWindows: npm run build && npx playwright test DefaultConfig --grep-invert "RelationType"

author: Umbraco
